city.list: select id, data ->> 'name' as name_en, lat, lng from cities where country_id = $1

countrycity.list: select id, data ->> 'name' as name_en, lat, lng from cities where country_id = (select id from countries where lower(name) = lower($1) or lower(slug) = lower($1))

country.list: select id, name, slug from countries

get.byText: select * from countries where lower(name) = lower($1) or lower(slug) = lower($1)
get.byId: select id, name, slug from countries where id = $1
